Food | Lifestyle | Travel. Based in San Francisco Bay, California ☀️. Snapchat 👻: madelinelu

posts.description: Breakfast or snack? Here come waffle pops! ✌️😜✌️

Wish every weekend's breakfast looks like this... If you can only choose one of the three: pancakes, waffles or banana bread, which one would you choose? 🤔 Just one! I think banana bread for me. 🍌 🍞 😋

"You will never have to force anything that's truly meant to be." 🌿 Just weeks before our trip to Maui, I connected with @ellenfisher on Instagram. I was so inspired by her natural lifestyle on Maui as well as her vegan food. After we arrived Maui, we messaged each other and hoped to meet up. But with our busy travel schedule and her house renovation, we couldn’t find a time that fits both of us. So we wished each other well and hope to meet somewhere else in the future. Then on one of our last days on Maui, we decided spontaneously to visit Iao Valley since we had 30 mins to spare before taking our helicopter ride. Just I walked around the area to take photos, I noticed a girl in the parking lot with beautiful blond hair and stunning figure, but I couldn’t see her face. As I passed by her, I looked at her again and realized it was Ellen!!! I couldn’t believe it! We introduced our families to each other and got to spend a brief time together. 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 We love how she and Andrew decided to move to Maui for the wellbeing of the kids and for their commitment of the healthy lifestyle. It is truly inspiring. The little Elvis showed my kids how to swing in a banyan tree. And Sandy, OMG, I wish I could take him with me. He is just the cutes! So that’s the story how I meant to meet Ellen Fisher. Take a look at her account, watch her YouTube videos and give her a follow. She offers so many great tips on healthy eating as well as living. 🎬🌿

Just want to say "Thank you" to those who took the time to comment to my previous post yesterday! 🙏😊 It was absolutely fascinating to learn about you guys! We are all world citizens and living without borders! I love how social media connects people as well as inspires the way we live, cook, decorate and travel. It pushes us to try and do things that we couldn't have never thought of! (Sadly, there are also a lots of things I don't like about social media, hacking, privacy invasion, copyright infringements...) But I would like to focus on the good. Social media is a tool, which is up to us how we use it. For now, sending you sunny vibes from California and wish you a great weekend! ☀️😎🙌
Missing those spiritual mountains in Maui... 🌿⛰
Early birds catch the sunrise! 👩‍👧✌️ Let the boys sleep. 🙊
One of those places I wish to stay forever. 💦💙✨

Finally, we found "the tree of voices”of Pandora! 🌿🌒 And if we are really quiet, maybe we could hear the voices of our ancestors, too. 😜 PS: This is a very old banyan tree and the dangling vines are called aerial or adventitious prop roots. They help the tree to spread laterally by reaching the ground and then forming a new trunk. You can see more of this tree on my Instastories. 💫 #earthday #EarthDay2017 #whpnaturalbeauty

Standing at 10,023 feet (3,055 meter), watch the sun dancing over mount Haleakala (meaning "House of the sun", is the world's tallest stand alone mountain). 🌅Sunset is never the same again! 🙌 #whpnaturalbeauty #earthday
My happy place is where these three are! 👨🏽👧🏽👦🏽 Plus the beach and the ocean! 🌊🏝🤙#whpnaturalbeauty
